Fortune.title: 2019 OVERVIEW
Fortune.content: This year, you can be lucky in love and money! Your home and family life, and those who are close enough to call family, take priority with closeness and stronger connections being made.

Fortune.title: LOVE
Fortune.content: A lover who is different in some way can enter your life this year. Be open to love unconditionally. It is the person on the inside that is important. So, be careful not to pay too much attention to the judgments of other people.

Fortune.title: CAREER
Fortune.content: Look carefully at a new opportunity, it can boost your bank balance, but donâ€™t make any rash decisions without first doing your own research.

Fortune.title: MONEY
Fortune.content: This is a year of opportunity, but it is up to you to recognize what options will be right for you and then to act on them.

Fortune.title: SPIRIT
Fortune.content: When life gets messy, or you feel out of control, spiritual evolvement comes from knowing that in the end, all will be perfect, just as it should be.
